title: Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale
subtitle: The hunt is on. The whale is a god.
author: AI Publishing
description_short: Captain Ahab hunts a kaiju whale with a crew of monster hunters in this epic action-horror mashup of Moby Dick.
description_medium: In this action-horror mashup, Moby Dick is a colossal kaiju. Ahab assembles a crew of monster hunters armed with harpoon cannons and steam-powered armor for a final, furious revenge. A high-seas epic of madness and metal.
description_long:
Herman Melville’s classic tale is reborn in fire, blood, and steam. The white whale that took Captain Ahab’s leg is no mere beast—it is a leviathan kaiju, a god of the deep whose wrath can shatter ships and drown islands. Driven by an obsession that borders on divinity, Ahab forsakes the common whaler’s lance. He summons a crew of hardened monster hunters and engineers, forging a weapon of a ship armed with harpoon cannons and clad in steam-powered armor.

The stakes are no longer mere profit or revenge, but the survival of every soul upon the sea. As the Pequod II plunges into haunted waters, the crew must battle not only the apocalyptic whale but the creeping madness of their own captain. This is a story forged in steam and fury, where every man must confront what monstrous depths they will plumb for vengeance.

Fans of the relentless action in Nicholas Sansbury Smith’s ‘Hell Divers’ and the cosmic dread of H.P. Lovecraft will be gripped by this brutal reimagining. It delivers the emotional gut-punch of a classic tragedy fused with the visceral thrill of a monster-hunting epic. Prepare for a voyage where the sea itself is a battlefield.

Dare to answer Ahab’s call to arms. Secure your copy of *Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale* today, and witness the legend reborn in terror.
